availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Paradise Doughty in Warren County on January 20, 1853. Father of Attwood G. Shirley, J.A. Shirley, and Mary A. Shirley. Farmer in Warren County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 164.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Lucus Precinct, p. 220A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994057, Warren County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Warren County Marriages, Film 000242961.
